text: ivarkal pumiyil pirayanam ceytu tankalukku mun iruntavarkalin mutivu ennavayirru enpataip parkkavillaiya? Melum avarkal valimaiyil ivarkalaivita mikkavarkalaka iruntanar vanankalilo, pumiyilo ulla etuvum allahvai iyalamal akka mutiyatu. Niccayamaka allah yavarraiyum nankarintavan; perarralutaiyavan
